EmailTemplate.name: Live Follow Up - In Progress
EmailTemplate.subject: Your Luxury Presence revisions are under way
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hi {!Contact.FirstName},
Thank you so much for reaching out to the Luxury Presence Support team today. As mentioned, we're working on the following requests, and will have an update for you soon:
Edits | Revisions
We'll reach out if we need any additional information. In the meantime, feel free to let us know if you have any questions!
Have a wonderful day!
Best regards, {!User.FirstName} Luxury Presence Support (310) 955-1077 support@luxurypresence.com
